project_description:
NEW DRIVEWAY ONLY, APPROACHES STAYING AS THEY ARE, NO WORK IN PUBLIC AREAS (Tear-out and replace existing concrete driveway only & add more concrete next to the garage door on the right side).  NOTE: WORK WAS DONE W/O A PERMIT.
**HOMEOWNER HOMESTEADED PER DCAD**
reasoning: This is a low-margin concrete job for a mid-value property where the owner is absentee, indicating they are likely a landlord or investor. The work was already done without a permit, so the lead is for retroactive approval, which is a lower-value, price-sensitive service. While the project description is specific, the combination of low property value and absentee ownership points to a customer focused on the cheapest compliant solution.
ideal_contractor: A concrete contractor specializing in small, efficient jobs and navigating city inspections for retroactive permits.
flags: Absentee owner (likely landlord)|Work already done (retroactive permit)|Property value below $400k (price-sensitive market)|Lead is 13 days old (approaching 30-day freshness limit for concrete)
